assets.strContent: Part of the Learning Technologies Group
Select a [b]company logo[/b] to find out more.
Select [b]next [/b]to continue.

Gomo is part of Learning Technologies Group plc (LTG) which enables us to share and draw on expertise with other businesses in the LTG portfolio. These 11 brands, and their products and service teams, are at the forefront of innovation and best-practice in the learning technology and talent management sectors.
Affirmity provides expert analysis, consulting, training, and software to optimize affirmative action and diversity and inclusion programs.
As a market leader in integrated talent management and learning solutions, PeopleFluent helps companies hire, develop, and advance a skilled and motivated workforce.

Breezy HR is a recruiting platform and applicant tracking system that believes hiring doesn't have to be messy. Based in Jacksonville, FL and with customers around the world, Breezy HR has thrown out the traditional hiring model and replaced it with a set of tools that engage hiring teams, manage day-to-day chaos and ensure teams continue to attract and hire great employees with less effort.
Gomo is a cloud-based, fully responsive, HTML5 e-learning authoring and delivery platform.
PRELOADED is a BAFTA-winning full-service games studio, using the power of play to reinvent the way organizations connect with their audiences.

VectorVMS delivers software and services to help businesses optimize their contingent workforce programmes. The company works closely with clients and partners—drawing on more than 20 years of experience to design and implement best-fit vendor management solutions.

Instilled by PeopleFluent is an easy-to-use, structured corporate Learning Experience Platform (LXP) that supports a modern learning culture. The platform leads learners to the right content—created by subject matter experts and peer groups—without distractions. 

Instilled combines award-winning technologies from Gomo, Rustici and Watershed into one efficient Learning Experience Platform.

Watershed is a SaaS Learning Analytics Platform that enables learning departments to explore all their learning and performance data in one place, measure how L&D affects business outcomes and maximize investments in learning.

As the world's leading e-learning standards experts, Rustici provides the software and expertise to help companies create, distribute, manage and play e-learning-compliant content.

Rustici actively supports the development of the Experience API (xAPI), cmi5 and SCORM standards in partnership with Advanced Distributed Learning (ADL), IMS Global and other leading trade organisations, and helped research and draft the first version of xAPI.

Eukleia is a specialist Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) training consultancy. Eukleia creates engaging, accessible learning – either fully customised courses and materials or ready-to-go courses that can be edited or taken as off-the-shelf content. Eukleia offers a wide variety of training solutions, including e-learning courses, face-to-face training, videos and games.

LEO Learning is a learning technologies firm focused on working with international organisations to help them revolutionize their approach to learning. LEO Learning's extensive experience and expertise has helped global businesses to transform their learning and deliver measurable business results.

Learning Technologies Group plc (LTG) is a market-leader in the fast-growing workplace digital learning and talent management market. LTG offers large organisations a new approach to learning and talent in a business world driven by digital transformation.
Open LMS provides a strong, open source foundation for competency-based blended, online and professional learning to drive institutional and organizational effectiveness.
Tap on one of the items in the architecture diagram below to find out more.
Create, deliver, update and track beautiful eLearning, [b]anywhere[/b]

With Gomo, learning teams around the world work together seamlessly, speeding up the eLearning production process and taking the headache away from creating, delivering, analyzing and updating eLearning content.
Whether you're a learning designer looking for beautiful templates and simple delivery, or a large organization needing a custom look and feel, team collaboration and more, we've got you covered.
Digital designer
Access Gomo through a web browser on any device, Mac or PC.
Learning designer
Work together as a team from anywhere in the world.
Reviewer
Add review notes directly onto course pages with full workflow.
Gomo Authoring publish options
xAPI analytics

The Gomo xAPI analytics dashboard allows you to view reports by date range, topic, device type, geography and more. Advanced analytics allow you to see trends and drill down into detailed information on learning effectiveness.
Website embed
Gomo delivery enables you to easily embed your courses on a website or intranet page.
Direct link
Gomo's direct link allows you to share gomo courses via Social platforms (e.g. Twitter or LinkedIn), email and more.
LMS Wrapper

Embed a course in any LMS in seconds and update dynamically from Gomo. Our unique SCORM LMS wrapper is a tiny file of around 17KB.

Once embedded, your courses can be updated instantly without the hassle of republishing, SCORM, ZIP, FTP, upload, download etc. Your LMS users will immediately see the new version, saving you hours of time and hassle.

Embed a course in any LMS in seconds and update dynamically from gomo. Our unique SCORM LMS wrapper is a tiny file of around 17KB.

Once embedded, your courses can be updated instantly without the hassle of republishing, SCORM, ZIP, FTP, upload, download etc.
Responsive and Adaptive HTML5 Content

Content built in Gomo is fully responsive, right out-of-the-box. It will work seamlessly on desktop, tablet and smartphones without the need to build three versions of the course. No programming needed!

Responsive design repositions itself based on the screen space available. You create content to appear in a two, three or four column layout, which will display on each device in the most effective way possible.
Content Creation
Video, audio, graphic, text, and interactive content are just a drag and drop away with Gomo's intuitive user interface for fast, flexible content creation.
[actionset=p105298i02s04a03.0]Easy Course Management[/actionset]
[actionset=p105298i02s04a04.0]Responsive and Adaptive Design[/actionset]
[actionset=p105298i02s04a05.0]Rich Editing Capabilities[/actionset]
Easy Course Management
Responsive and Adaptive Design
Rich Editing Capabilities

Forget about complicated software. With Gomo you're up and running in minutes—just log in through your web browser and start working. Plus you can start creating your content straight away with our quick-start wizards!

Our course manager knows the structure of your content and will display the structure visually, giving you an at-a-glance view of your project and production progress.

Gomo's rich interactive assets allow you to display your information in a variety of formats. Assets include accordion, carousel, image wall, filmstrip, comicstrip, zoomable image, and numerous question types. You can also embed third-party web content directly into your courses with our iFrame asset.

Easily align your assets for maximum design flexibility. Left-, right- and center-justify your images or get them to fit to width. Our in-built image editor allows you to modify your images. Take advantage of powerful actions that allow you to enhance the interactivity of your courses—link to screens or sub-screens, external web links, group resources, and more.
Collaboration
Boost productivity with our collaborative content development functionality that allows your team to work together seamlessly, no matter where they're based.

objParameters.strTextToCreateSubScreenID:
[b]Easy Permission Settings[/b]
Gomo's permission settings allow you to put the right people into the right roles: administrator, editor, or reviewer. And because we're cloud-based, there's no software required!

objImageSrc.strAltText: Online Review / Preview with Full Workflow

objParameters.strTextToCreateSubScreenID:
[b]Online Review/Preview with Full Workflow[/b]
No more spreadsheets and email trails—your courses can be reviewed live on our server. Include your subject matter experts in the review process and add review notes directly into the course preview with full workflow and task assignment.

objImageSrc.strAltText: Direct Link and QR Code Sharing

objParameters.strTextToCreateSubScreenID:
[b]Direct Link and QR Code Sharing[/b]
Deliver your courses for review and testing to your colleagues via direct link or QR code. By using a QR code reader, colleagues can transfer the course straight to their smartphone or tablet.

assets.strContent: Customization
Make your eLearning your own with our customizable library of beautiful themes.

arrStepData.strContent:
[b]Library of Themes [/b]
With a Gomo subscription, you have access to a library of beautiful themes you can use for your projects. New themes are added regularly so your content always looks fresh.

[b]Powerful Theme Configuration [/b]
All themes can be adjusted to match your brand or project requirements—from colors, to fonts, to placement. You can also save your theme edits so that you can use them again. And if you need support with a fully custom theme created by one of our developers? That's possible too.

assets.strContent: Content Delivery

Getting content into the hands of your users is easy with Gomo. Deliver content to users, websites, LMSs, social media sites and more with a single click, taking the headache out of multi-device publishing.

[b]Easy Updates [/b]
Need to make a change? Update the course in Gomo and the whole world instantly sees the new version.

[b]Top Course Performance [/b]
Gomo automatically publishes the smallest files possible, ensuring the course is fully optimized, and gives lightning-fast performance.

[b]SCORM LMS Wrapper [/b]
With Gomo's SCORM LMS wrapper, you can embed Gomo courses directly into any SCORM LMS. This is done using our SCORM LMS wrapper file (a tiny file of around 17KB!).
Analytics
Prove that your learning works with our built-in xAPI reporting dashboard which gives you an easy and visual way to analyze learner data.

[b]Visual Analytics Dashboards [/b]
The Gomo analytics dashboard allows you to view reports by date range, learning, device type, geography, and more.

[b]Effective Reporting [/b]
From the dashboard, you can drill down into a detailed reports page where seven different reports allow you to zone in on learner activity.

[b]SCORM LMS Wrapper [/b]
Even if using the SCORM LMS wrapper, Gomo will track your courses with full xAPI tracking, giving you far richer data than you'll ever get from a SCORM LMS.
